Release of Patient Assessment Documentation Package V.1.0 (NUPA*1.0)
**UPDATE MESSAGE**
 
Release Date:  4-17-12
Compliance Date:  5-18-12
 
MANDATE:
 
All sites are required to install the application in their Production 
accounts within 30 days after release, May 18, 2012. 
 
At this time implementation is not mandated. The PADP implementation team
is working with seven first adopter sites to implement and evaluate the
application across all acute care practice settings. Guidance regarding
ongoing training and use of this application will be provided to the field
by Applied Informatics Service in collaboration with the  VA Office of
Nursing Services (ONS). 
 
Training materials and useful information may be found on the following
sharepoint:
 
http://vaww.oed.portal.va.gov/programs/class3_to_class1/padp/field_develop
ment/Library/Forms/File%20Name.aspx
